text:
Stephanie Sigman (born February 28, 1987) is a Mexican-American actress.. She was born in Ciudad Obregón, Sonora, Mexico. Her first movie role was in the 2011 drama movie "Miss Bala".
Sigman is known for her roles in "Pioneer" (2013), "Spectre" (2015), "Going Under" (2016), and ' (2017). On television, Sigman starred as Valeria Vélez in the first and second seasons of Netflix crime thriller, "Narcos" (2015).
